Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Stylish \Styl"ish\, a. Having style or artistic quality; given to, or fond of, the display of style; highly fashionable; modish; as, a stylish dress, house, manner. -- {Styl"ish*ly}, adv. -- {Styl"ish*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]

stylish adj 1: having elegance or taste or refinement in manners or dress; "a little less posh but every bit as stylish as Lord Peter Wimsey"; "the stylish resort of Gstadd" [syn: {fashionable}] [ant: {styleless}] 2: being or in accordance with current fashion; "fashionable clothing"; "the fashionable side of town"; "a fashionable cafe" [syn: {fashionable}] [ant: {unfashionable}]
